General.Name: Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co Ltd A
General.Description: Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, rents, and sells industrial carriers in China. The company's industrial carriers portfolio includes technology research and development, manufacturing, headquarters business buildings, logistics, and warehousing. It also involved in the park development and operations, and industrial investment activities. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Automation Instrumentation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. in November 2015. Shanghai Lingang Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
